mapper.insert: insert into pb_operation_log (id, create_time, pb_user_id, pb_user_name, operate_content, operate_type, operate_ip, remark) values (#{pbOperationLog.id}, #{pbOperationLog.createTime}, #{pbOperationLog.pbUserId}, #{pbOperationLog.pbUserName}, #{pbOperationLog.operateContent}, #{pbOperationLog.operateType}, #{pbOperationLog.operateIp}, #{pbOperationLog.remark})
mapper.update: update pb_operation_log set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pb_user_id = #{pbUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pb_user_name = #{pbUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_content = #{operateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, pb_user_id, pb_user_name, operate_content, operate_type, operate_ip, remark from pb_operation_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, pb_user_id, pb_user_name, operate_content, operate_type, operate_ip, remark from pb_operation_log
